title: Luxury house in Sea Cliff with 3 levels, 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms
map_address: El Camino Del Mar near McLaren Ave
posting_body: Mazal55Properties
The house is remodeled and spacious with a great layout, and is offered furnished.
It is charming and beautiful with lots of details, has thoughtful front landscaping and a large backyard and a patio, and has a great view of the Golden Gate.
On the main level the entry opens to a large foyer which connects to a beautiful and large living room with a fireplace, and to a formal dining room.
There is a very large kitchen with high end appliances, and a sunny breakfast nook.
There is also a den and a full bathroom, and access to the patio and backyard.
The stairway leading to the top level features massive wooden railings, and has a wide intermediate level with a seating area.
The top level has a wide and spacious hall, and 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, including a master suite with its own master bathroom.
The master bathroom is large and has a Jacuzzi tub and separate shower, all in beautiful marble.
Two of the remaining three bedrooms on this level connect directly to to the hall, and the third is an extension of one of those bedrooms.
The bottom level has a room which can be used as bedroom, or as a family room.
It has a wet bar, a walk-in closet, and a full bathroom.
There is also a laundry room on this level.
The location is peaceful and very close to Presidio and Lincoln Parks.
China Beach and Baker Beach are nearby, and there is very easy access to the northbound 101 freeway.
Geary Boulevard can also be accessed easily for quick access to the rest of the city, and Golden Gate Park is just across the Richmond District.
The nearest supermarket is just 5 blocks away.
Approximately 2900 sqft.
No pets.
The house has a garage which can accommodate 3 to 4 cars.
The house is offered furnished.
Can be leased for short term or long term.
The minimum lease term is 3 months.
Mazal Bordo
Relocation Agent
